tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: select T_XT_JLDW.mc as JLDW,JH,T_JH.MC as JHMC,XH,A.JX,A.Sl,CKDM,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC, to_char(A.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')RKRQ ,ADD_MONTHS(A.YFRQ,12*A.YFQX) YFQZ, A.YJ,to_char(A.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')YFRQ,A.YFQX,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,V_DW.MC CXDWMC,A.FJH,A.GZXX,A.BH,SCCJ,SYSJ from T_CK_DX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW where 1=1 and A.xz=0 AND SBBH IS NULL ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: select T_XT_JLDW.mc as JLDW,JH,T_JH.MC as JHMC,XH,A.JX,A.Sl,CKDM,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC, to_char(A.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')RKRQ ,ADD_MONTHS(A.YFRQ,12*A.YFQX) YFQZ, A.YJ,to_char(A.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')YFRQ,A.YFQX,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,V_DW.JM CXDWMC,A.FJH,A.GZXX,A.SBBH,A.SBRQ,A.BH,SCCJ,SYSJ from T_CK_DX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW where 1=1 and A.xz=0 ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: SELECT JH,T_JH.MC JHMC,T_XT_JLDW.MC JLDW,XH,ZL,A.JX,T_JH_JX.MC JXMC,CKDM,T_XT_CK.MC CKMC,FHD,CXDW,V_DW.JM CXDWMC,SXRQ,SXLB,T_SX_LB.MC SXLBMC,HTBH,A.SL,ZYLB,JXQN,JXQXS,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,A.FJH,A.GZYY ,A.SBBH,A.SBRQ,A.BH,A.BZ,SCCJ,SYSJ FROM T_CK_SX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN T_XT_CK ON T_XT_CK.DWID=A.DWID AND T_XT_CK.CKID=A.CKDM LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_SX_LB ON T_SX_LB.ID=A.SXLB where 1=1 and A.SL>0 AND SBBH IS NULL ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: SELECT JH,T_JH.MC JHMC,T_XT_JLDW.MC JLDW,XH,ZL,A.JX,T_JH_JX.MC JXMC,CKDM,T_XT_CK.MC CKMC,FHD,CXDW,V_DW.JM CXDWMC,SXRQ,SXLB,T_SX_LB.MC SXLBMC,HTBH,A.SL,ZYLB,JXQN,JXQXS,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,A.FJH,A.GZYY,A.SBBH,A.SBRQ,A.BH,A.BZ,SCCJ,SYSJ FROM T_CK_SX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN T_XT_CK ON T_XT_CK.DWID=A.DWID AND T_XT_CK.CKID=A.CKDM LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_SX_LB ON T_SX_LB.ID=A.SXLB where 1=1 and A.SL>0 ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: SELECT SBBH,to_char(SBRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') SBRQ,to_char(JZRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') JZRQ FROM T_ck_dx A WHERE 1=1 and SBBH is not null GROUP BY SBBH,to_char(SBRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(JZRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY SBBH

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: select '0'as XZ,T_XT_JLDW.mc as JLDW,BH,A.JH,T_JH.MC as JHMC,A.XH,A.JX,A.Sl,CKDM,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC, to_char(A.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')RKRQ ,ADD_MONTHS(A.YFRQ,12*A.YFQX) YFQZ, A.YJ,to_char(A.YFRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')YFRQ,A.YFQX,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,V_DW.JM CXDWMC,A.FJH,A.GZXX,A.SBBH,A.SBRQ,A.BH,CASE WHEN A.PFZT=0 THEN '未批复' when a.pfzt=1 then '已批复' else '其它'end PFMC,SCCJ,CK.YJ,SYSJ from T_CK_DX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_CK_SX SX ON SX.DXBH=A.BH AND SX.JH=A.JH AND SX.JX=A.JX AND SX.XH=A.XH LEFT JOIN T_CK_CRK CK ON SX.BH=CK.BH where 1=1 and A.xz=0 ORDER BY A.JX,A.JH

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: SELECT SBBH,to_char(SBRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') SBRQ,to_char(JZRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') JZRQ FROM T_ck_SX A WHERE 1=1 and SBBH is not null GROUP BY SBBH,to_char(SBRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(JZRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY SBBH

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: SELECT '0'as XZ,JH,T_JH.MC JHMC,T_XT_JLDW.MC JLDW,XH,ZL,A.JX,T_JH_JX.MC JXMC,CKDM,T_XT_CK.MC CKMC,FHD,CXDW,V_DW.JM CXDWMC,SXRQ,SXLB,T_SX_LB.MC SXLBMC,HTBH,A.SL,ZYLB,JXQN,JXQXS,A.HCLB,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,A.FJH,A.GZYY,A.SBBH,A.SBRQ,A.BH,A.BZ,CASE WHEN A.PFZT=0 THEN '未批复' when a.pfzt=1 then '已批复' else '其它'end PFMC,SCCJ,SYSJ FROM T_CK_SX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN T_XT_CK ON T_XT_CK.DWID=A.DWID AND T_XT_CK.CKID=A.CKDM LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_SX_LB ON T_SX_LB.ID=A.SXLB where 1=1 and A.SL>0 ORDER BY A.JX,A.JH

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印
tableInfo.sql: select T_XT_JLDW.mc as JLDW,T_JH.MC as JHMC,A.Sl,A.CKDM,T_JH_JX.MC AS JXMC, to_char(A.RKRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')RKRQ ,T_XT_HCLB.MC HCLBMC,A.*,V_DW.JM CXDWMC,SX.GZYY from T_CK_TX A left join T_JH on T_JH.id=A.Jh AND T_JH.JX=A.JX left join T_JH_JX on T_JH_JX.id=A.jx left join T_XT_HCLB ON T_XT_HCLB.ID=A.HCLB left join T_XT_JLDW on T_XT_JLDW.ID = T_JH.DW LEFT JOIN V_DW ON V_DW.ID=A.CXDW LEFT JOIN T_CK_SX SX ON A.DXBH=SX.DXBH AND A.JH=SX.JH AND A.XH=SX.XH where 1=1 AND A.SBBH IS NULL ORDER BY A.JX

tableInfo.caption: 待修件清单打印

tableInfo.sql: SELECT SBBH,to_char(SBRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') SBRQ,to_char(JZRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') JZRQ FROM T_ck_TX A WHERE 1=1 and SBBH is not null GROUP BY SBBH,to_char(SBRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(JZRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY SBBH
